ca.team3161.lib.utils.controls

Class Joystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.team3161.lib.utils.controls.Joystick

  • public class Joystick
extends java.lang.Object
    A thin wrapper over the FRC Joystick class, with built-in Y-axis inversion and deadzone

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Joystick(int port, float deadzone)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Joystick

        public Joystick(int port,
        float deadzone)
        Parameters:
        port - which USB port this is plugged into, as reported by the Drive Station
        deadzone - Axis values less than this in absolute value will be ignored
